NKMOF-1-M.temperature: Room temperature for soaking in water, 120 K for SCXRD data collection
NKMOF-1-M.time: More than 1 year for soaking in water, Not specified for SCXRD
NKMOF-1-M.equipment: Powder X-ray diffractometry (PXRD), BET surface-area measurements, Single-crystal X-ray diffraction (SCXRD)
NKMOF-1-M.additional_information: NKMOF-1-M exhibits a three-dimensional (3D) framework with one-dimensional (1D) square channels. It possesses strong binding affinity for propyne and propadiene over propylene. The material retains its porosity and crystallinity after soaking in water for more than 1 year at room temperature.

propyne@NKMOF-1-Cu.temperature: Room temperature for gas atmosphere exposure, 120 K for SCXRD data collection
propyne@NKMOF-1-Cu.additional_information: Propyne molecules are located between the four pyrazine rings, forming strong hydrogen bonds with the sulfur atoms and one carbon atom of the pyrazine ring.

propadiene@NKMOF-1-Cu.temperature: Room temperature for gas atmosphere exposure, 120 K for SCXRD data collection
propadiene@NKMOF-1-Cu.additional_information: Propadiene molecules are located between the four pyrazine rings, forming strong hydrogen bonds with the sulfur atoms and one carbon atom of the pyrazine ring.

breakthrough_experiments.time: 1825 min g@1 for NKMOF-1-Ni, Not specified for NKMOF-1-Cu
breakthrough_experiments.additional_information: NKMOF-1-Ni displayed the best propyne/propadiene/propylene separation ability at 298 K, retaining propylene for a remarkable time before the breakthrough of propadiene and propyne.

cycling_breakthrough_experiments.additional_information: The breakthrough curves for the ternary mixture over five cycles almost overlapped, and the crystallinity of NKMOF-1-Ni was retained, indicating excellent regenerability and stability.
